Package hep.io.root.implementation

Interface Summary
Leaf  
 

Class Summary
AbstractRootObject An abstract implementation of RootObjectRepresentation
DefaultClassFactory The root class factory is used to create instances of RootClass object.
FileClassFactory A class factory used inside a RootFileReader.
GenericRootClass A RootClass based on a StreamerInfo object
GenericRootObject An implementation of a root object based on a StreamerInfo object.
HollowRootObject A hollow object has an associated branch from which it obtains its data.
RootByteArrayInputStream A ByteArrayInputStream that will reveal its current position.
RootInputStream An implementation of RootInput
RootRandomAccessFile  
SpecificRootClass A RootClass based on a real java object
SpecificRootObject  
StreamerInfoNew An implementation of StreamerInfo which takes its data from a TStreamerInfo object.
StreamerInfoString An implementation of StreamerInfo which takes info from a String
